PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-01902025-02-25PS
ActFirearms Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Firearms Licences Regulations (Notice of Suspension)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FIREARMS LICENCES REGULATIONS (NOTICE OF SUSPENSION) in order to ensure that the existing notice procedures for licence refusals and revocations also apply to notices of licence suspension.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2025-0048 Publication Date: 2025-03-12
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the FIREARMS LICENCES REGULATIONS (NOTICE OF SUSPENSION) in order to ensure that the existing notice procedures for licence refusals and revocations also apply to notices of licence suspension.
